subject: Password reset issue
answer:
Hello,

Here’s the information related to your request:

• To reset your password, go to the login page and click on the "Forgot Password" link. You will receive an email with a reset link. Follow the instructions in the email to set a new password.
• The reset link remains valid for 30 minutes from the time it is issued.
• Check your spam folder and ensure you are using the correct registered email address. If the issue persists, contact customer support.
• Yes. You can update your email address under Account Settings → Personal Information.

If this does not resolve your issue, the ticket will be escalated.

Regards,
Support Team
